title: Concave lens - 9 cm lightbulb is 30 cm from lens

content.question: A lightbulb is located along the principal axis of a concave (diverging) lens, as shown in the figure. The bulb has a height of <math alttext="9.0 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> and is located <math alttext="30 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>30</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math> from the lens. The resulting image formed by the lens is virtual and has a height of <math alttext="3.0 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cm</mi></math>. What is the focal length of the lens?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
